channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ten-year Treasury yields slip to one-month low as traders return after Thanksgiving
item.description: Bond yields dipped early Friday as the market re-opened following the Thanksgiving break.

item.title: Alibaba researchers unveil Marco-o1, an LLM with advanced reasoning capabilities
item.description: The model uses more cycles during inference to generate more tokens and review responses, improving its performance on reasoning tasks.
